bib.abstract: The existing typologies of weblog genres are based on the blog topic (eg cooking blogs, travels, business) or its medium (eg vlogs, picture logs), Maryl, Niewiadomski and Kidawa conducted an interpretive study on the sample of 322 popular Polish blogs1. They adopted a new-rhetorical approach, basing on Carolyn Miller's concept of genre as a social action2, concentrating mostly on: the blog's communicative purpose and functions.
